Breakdown: Open Data 📊

Feb 28, 2018

  • civictech
  • breakdown

This is the to the first of our series of breakdown talks. These sessions are meant to summarize various civic technology concepts. Our subject today is Open Data.

🎧 Listen

Resources and Shoutouts:

  • Project open data: project-open-data.cio.gov/
  • Data.gov: www.data.gov/open-gov/
  • Sunlight Foundation: sunlightfoundation.com/
  • My building doesn’t recycle: mybuildingdoesntrecycle.com/
  • Govlab: Nepal Earthquake case study: odimpact.org/case-nepal-earthquake-recovery.html
  • Cincinnati Open Data Portal: data.cincinnati-oh.gov/
  • Chicago Open Data Portal: data.cityofchicago.org/
  • Chi Hack Night: chihacknight.org/
